title: Health staff 'too stressed' to deal with disasters

title_detail.value: Health staff 'too stressed' to deal with disasters

summary: Increasing stress and a lack of motivation among healthcare staff could result in hospitals having to shut down in the wake of a major incident such as flooding or an earthquake.

summary_detail.value: Increasing stress and a lack of motivation among healthcare staff could result in hospitals having to shut down in the wake of a major incident such as flooding or an earthquake.
